metadata.title: USN-6372-1 -- DBus vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that DBus incorrectly handled certain invalid messages. A local attacker could possibly use this issue to cause DBus to crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6372-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  dbus-1-doc - 1.10.6-1ubuntu3.6+esm3 dbus - 1.10.6-1ubuntu3.6+esm3 libdbus-1-dev - 1.10.6-1ubuntu3.6+esm3 dbus-user-session - 1.10.6-1ubuntu3.6+esm3 dbus-x11 - 1.10.6-1ubuntu3.6+esm3 dbus-tests - 1.10.6-1ubuntu3.6+esm3 libdbus-1-3 - 1.10.6-1ubuntu3.6+esm3 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
